message.reason: '%1' is not a recognized transformation type.
message.response: Supported transformation types are .

message.reason: Input not specified, or specified using the wrong parameter.
Cannot find the user-specified XSLT stylesheet '%1'.
Invalid DITA topic extension '%1'.
message.response: Supported values are '.dita' and '.xml'.

message.reason: The '%1' argument is deprecated.
message.response: This argument is no longer supported.

message.reason: The '%1' argument is deprecated.
message.response: Please use the argument '%2' instead.

message.reason: Cannot find the specified DITAVAL file '%1'.
The @%1 attribute is deprecated.
message.response: Use @%2 instead.

message.reason: The internal property '%1' may not be set directly.
message.response: Use the '%2' property instead.

message.reason: The input resource '%1' cannot be located or read.
message.response: Please ensure that '%1' exists and that you have permission to access it.

message.reason: Failed to create new instance for '%1'.
message.response: Please ensure that '%1' exists and that you have permission to access it.

message.reason: Duplicate condition in filter file for rule '%1'.
message.response: The first encountered condition will be used.

message.reason: Duplicate condition in filter file for rule '%1'.
message.response: The first encountered condition will be used.

message.reason: Duplicate condition in filter file for rule '%1'.
message.response: The first encountered condition will be used.

message.reason: Cannot overwrite the '%1' resource with '%2'. The modified result may not be available to the following transformation steps.
message.response: Check if the resource is locked by some other application during the transformation process.

message.reason: Failed to parse the input resource '%1'.
Failed to parse the referenced resource '%1'.
Found an <indexterm> element with no content.
message.response: Setting the term to ***.

message.reason: Log file '%1' was generated successfully in directory '%2'.
message.response: Any messages from the transformation process are available in the log file; additional details about each message are available in the documentation.

message.reason: At least one plug-in in '%1' is required by plug-in '%2'. Plug-in '%2' cannot be loaded.
message.response: Check and see whether all prerequisite plug-ins are installed.

message.reason: The '%1' resource will not generate output because all content has been filtered out by DITAVAL "exclude" conditions, or the resource is not valid DITA.
message.response: Please check the '%1' resource and the DITAVAL file to see if this is the intended result.

message.reason: The '%1' resource will not generate output because all content has been filtered out by DITAVAL "exclude" conditions, or the resource is not valid DITA.
message.response: Please check the '%1' resource and the DITAVAL file to see if this is the intended result.

message.reason: Failed to parse the input resource '%1' because all of its content has been filtered out.
message.response: This will happen if the resource has filter conditions on the root element, and a DITAVAL file excludes all content based on those conditions.

message.reason: The specified image file '%1' is not available. It will not be included in the output.
message.response: Please ensure that '%1' exists and that you have permission to access it.

message.reason: The input to the "topic merge" process cannot be found.
message.response: Correct any earlier errors and try the build again, or see the documentation for additional causes.

message.reason: The "topic merge" process did not generate any output.
message.response: Correct any earlier errors and try the build again, or see the documentation for additional causes.

message.reason: No @format attribute was found on a reference to the '%1' resource, which does not appear to be DITA.
message.response: If this is not a DITA resource, set the @format attribute to an appropriate value; otherwise set the @format attribute to "dita".

message.reason: No @domains attribute was found for the <%1> element.
message.response: This generally indicates that the DTD or schema was not developed properly according to the DITA specification.

message.reason: No @class attribute was found for the <%1> element.
message.response: The element will be processed as an unknown or non-DITA element.

message.reason: No rule for '%1' was found in the DITAVAL file. This value will use the default action, or a parent prop action if specified.
message.response: To remove this message, specify a rule for '%1' in the DITAVAL file.

message.reason: No valid content found in topicref '%1' during chunk processing.
message.response: Please specify an existing and valid topic for the topic reference.

message.reason: Failed to parse the input resource '%1' (the content is not valid).
message.response: If '%1' does not have a DOCTYPE declaration, please make sure that all @class attributes are present.

message.reason: The '%1' resource is outside the scope of the input directory.
message.response: To lower the severity level, use the Ant parameter 'outer.control', and set the value to "warn" or "quiet". Otherwise, move the '%1' resource to the directory where the input map or topic is stored.

message.reason: The '%1' resource is outside the scope of the input directory.
The XML schema and DTD validation function of the parser is turned off.
message.response: Please make sure the input is normalized DITA with @class attributes included, otherwise it will not be processed correctly.

message.reason: The <%1> element is specialized from unrecognized metadata.
message.response: Please make sure that the <%1> element is specialized from an existing metadata element in the core DITA vocabulary.

message.reason: There is no target specified for the conref push action "pushafter".
message.response: Please specify @conref="pushtarget" and @conaction="mark" on the element that precedes the current element.

message.reason: An element uses @conaction="replace", but a @conref attribute is not found in the expected location.
The @conref attribute value "%1" uses invalid syntax.
message.response: The value should contain '#' followed by a topic or map ID, optionally followed by '/elemID' for a sub-topic element.

message.reason: Two elements both use conref push to replace the target '%1'.
message.response: Please delete one of the duplicate "replace" actions.

message.reason: The conref push function is trying to replace an element that does not exist ('%1' element in the '%2' resource).
There is a redundant conref action "pushbefore".
message.response: Please make sure that "mark" and "pushbefore" occur in pairs.

message.reason: The key '%1' is defined more than once in the same map.
The @conkeyref attribute value "%1" cannot be resolved because it does not contain a key or the key is not defined.
message.response: The build will use the @conref attribute for fallback, if one exists.

message.reason: Unable to find key definition for key reference '%1' in root scope.
message.response: The @href attribute may be used as fallback if it exists.

message.reason: Unable to find key definition for key reference '%1' in scope '%2'.
message.response: The @href attribute may be used as fallback if it exists.

message.reason: The @%1 attribute value '%3' on the <%2> element does not comply with the specified subject scheme.
message.response: According to the subject scheme map, the following values are valid for the @%1 attribute: '%4'

message.reason: Found an <index-see> or <index-see-also> reference to the term '%1', but that term is not defined in the index.
Unable to load target for coderef '%1'.
message.response: Please ensure that '%1' exists and that you have permission to access it.

message.reason: Code reference charset '%1' not supported.
message.response: See the documentation for supported character set values on the @format attribute.

message.reason: The input resource '%1' is not a valid DITA filename.
message.response: Please check '%1' to see if it is correct. The extensions ".dita" or ".xml" are supported for DITA topics.

message.reason: Unable to parse invalid @%1 attribute value '%2'.
Invalid key name '%1'.
Invalid xml:lang '%1'.
The @id attribute value "%1" is not unique within the topic that contains it.
Both '%1' and '%2' attributes defined.
message.response: A single element may not contain both generalized and specialized values for the same attribute.

message.reason: Invalid key scope name '%1'.
Key '%1' was used in conkeyref but is not bound to a DITA topic or map.
message.response: Cannot resolve conkeyref value '%2' as a valid content reference.

message.reason: Topic reference target is a DITA map but the @format attribute has not been set.
message.response: Set the @format attribute value to "ditamap".

message.reason: Invalid @%1 attribute value '%2'.
The @cols attribute is set to '%1' but the number of <colspec> elements was '%2'.
message.response: Please verify the number of columns in the table.

message.reason: The @chunk attribute uses both "to-content" and "by-topic" that conflict with each other.
message.response: Ignoring the "by-topic" token.

message.reason: Branch filter generated topic '%1' used more than once.
message.response: Renaming '%1' to '%2'.

message.reason: No @id attribute on topic type element '%1'.
message.response: Using generated ID '%2'.

message.reason: No @id attribute on topic type element '%1'.
Conref action "mark" without conref target.
Circular key definition '%1'.
An invalid @class attribute '%1' for was found for the <%2> element.
message.response: The element will be processed as an unknown or non-DITA element.

message.reason: Cannot find the specified DITAVAL '%1'.
Email link without correct @format attribute.
message.response: Using @format attribute value "email".

message.reason: Email link without correct @scope attribute.
message.response: Using @scope attribute value "external".

message.reason: The @rev attribute cannot be used with prop filter.
Absolute link '%1' without correct @scope attribute.
message.response: Using @scope attribute value "external".

message.reason: Absolute link '%1' without correct @scope attribute.
Invalid @action attribute '%1' on DITAVAL property.
The input resource '%1' cannot be loaded.
message.response: Ensure that grammar files for this document type are referenced and installed properly.

message.reason: The '%1' resource cannot be loaded.
message.response: Ensure that grammar files for this document type are referenced and installed properly.

message.reason: Integrator configuration '%1' has been deprecated.
message.response: Use plugin configuration '%1' instead.

message.reason: Ignoring empty @conref attribute: conref="".
Processing table cell failed.
The resource referenced as '%1' is capitalized differently on disk.
Cannot read '%1' with the '%2' character set.
message.response: Save the file with '%2' encoding.

message.reason: The '%1' parameter cannot be set with 'param' in project files.
message.response: Use '%2' instead.

message.reason: Split @chunk attribute found on <%1> element that does not reference a topic.
message.response: Ignoring chunk operation.

message.reason: Found @chunk attribute with value "%1" inside combine chunk.
message.response: Ignoring chunk operation.

message.reason: No string named '%1' was found for language '%2'. Using the default language '%3'.
message.response: Add a mapping between default language and desired language for the string '%1'.

message.reason: The @title attribute or element in the DITA map is required for Eclipse output.
The @anchorref attribute should either reference another DITA map or an Eclipse XML TOC file.
message.response: The value "%1" does not appear to reference either.

message.reason: Found a <navref> element that does not reference anything.
message.response: The <navref> element should either reference another DITA map or an Eclipse XML TOC file.

message.reason: Unable to find navigation title for reference to '%1'.
message.response: The build will use '%1' as the title in the Eclipse Table of Contents.

message.reason: Unknown file name extension in @href attribute value "%1".
message.response: References to non-DITA resources should set the @format attribute to match the resource (for example, 'txt', 'pdf', or 'html').

message.reason: Only DITA topics, HTML files, and images may be included in the compiled CHM file. The reference to '%1' will be ignored.
message.response: To remove this message, set the @toc attribute to "no" or the @processing-role attribute to "resource-only" on the topic reference.

message.reason: The resource '%1' cannot be loaded.
message.response: Please ensure that '%1' exists and that you have permission to access it.

message.reason: The resource '%1' cannot be loaded, and no navigation title is specified for the table of contents.
Cannot retrieve a title from '%1'. Using '%2' instead.
Unable to find target for @conref="%1".
There is more than one possible target for the @conref attribute value "%1". Only the first will be used.
message.response: Remove the duplicate ID in the referenced resource.

message.reason: When you conref another topic or an item in another topic, the @domains attribute of the target topic must be equal to or a subset of the current topic's @domains attribute.
message.response: Put the target under an appropriate domain. You can see the messages guide for more help.

message.reason: An element with the @conref attribute set to '%1' indirectly includes itself, which results in an infinite loop.
The @conref attribute value "%1" uses invalid syntax.
message.response: Conref references to a map element should contain '#' followed by an ID, such as mymap.ditamap#mytopicrefid.

message.reason: The @conref attribute value "%1" uses invalid syntax.
message.response: The value should contain '#' followed by a topic or map ID, optionally followed by '/elemID' for a sub-topic element.

message.reason: A reference to '%2' appears to reference a DITA document, but the @format attribute has inherited a value of '%1'. The document will not be processed as DITA.
Found a link or cross reference with an empty @href attribute: href="".
message.response: Remove the empty @href attribute or provide a value.

message.reason: The @type attribute on a topicref was set to "%1", but the topicref references a more specific '%2' topic. Note that the @type attribute cascades in maps, so the value "%1" may come from an ancestor topicref.

The @type attribute on a topicref was set to "%1", but the topicref references a '%2' topic. This may cause links to sort incorrectly in the output. Note that the @type attribute cascades in maps, so the value "%1" may come from an ancestor topicref.
Missing @navtitle attribute or element for peer topic '%1'.
message.response: References must provide a local navigation title when the target is not a local DITA resource.

message.reason: Missing @navtitle attribute or element for non-DITA resource '%1'.
message.response: References must provide a local navigation title when the target is not a local DITA resource.

message.reason: Unable to retrieve navtitle from target: '%1'. Using linktext (specified in topicmeta) as the navigation title.
Unable to retrieve navtitle from target: '%1'.
Missing linktext and navtitle for peer topic '%1'.
message.response: References must provide a local navigation title when the target is not a local DITA resource.

message.reason: Missing linktext and navtitle for non-DITA resource '%1'.
message.response: References must provide a local navigation title when the target is not a local DITA resource.

message.reason: Unable to retrieve linktext from target: '%1'. Using navigation title as fallback.
Unable to retrieve linktext from target: '%1'.
Link or cross reference must contain a valid @href or @keyref attribute; no link target is specified.
The @type attribute on a <%1> element was set to '%3', but the reference is to a more specific '%4' '%2'. This may cause links to sort incorrectly in the output.
The @type attribute on a <%1> element was set to '%3', but the reference is to a '%4' '%2'. This may cause links to sort incorrectly in the output.
The '%1' resource is not available to resolve link information.
Unable to retrieve link text from target: '%1'.
message.response: If the target is not accessible at build time, or does not have a title, provide the link text inside the reference.

message.reason: Unable to generate link text for a cross reference to a list item: '%1'.
Unable to generate link text for a cross reference to an unordered list item: '%1'.
Unable to generate the correct number for a cross reference to a footnote: '%1'.
Unable to generate link text for a cross reference to a dlentry (the dlentry or term cannot be found): '%1'.
No title found for this document; using "***" as HTML page title.
The @longdescref attribute on the <%1> element will be ignored.
message.response: Accessibility for object elements needs to be handled another way.

message.reason: Required cleanup area found.
message.response: To remove this message and hide the content, build without the DRAFT parameter.

message.reason: Draft comment area found.
message.response: To remove this message and hide the comments, build without the DRAFT parameter.

message.reason: Found more than one <title> element in a <%1> element. Using the first one as the element title.
DITAVAL based flagging is not currently supported for inline phrases in XHTML; ignoring flag value on '%1' attribute.
The link to '%1' may appear more than once in '%2'.
The <area> element in an image map does not specify a link target.
message.response: Please add an <xref> element with a link target to the <area> element.

message.reason: The <area> element in an image map should specify link text for better accessibility.
message.response: Link text should be specified directly when the target is not a local DITA resource.

message.reason: Area shape should be: default, rect, circle, poly, or blank (no value). The value '%1' is not recognized.
Area coordinates are blank. Coordinate points for the shape need to be specified.
References to non-DITA files will be ignored by the PDF, ODT, and RTF output transforms.
The default ID "org.sample.help.doc" is used for the Eclipse plug-in.
message.response: To use your own plug-in ID, specify it using the @id attribute on the map.

message.reason: No string named '%1' was found when creating generated text; using the value '%1' in the output.
A element that references another map indirectly includes itself, which results in an infinite loop. The original map reference is to '%1'.
Conflict text style is applied on the current element based on DITAVAL flagging rules.
message.response: Please check the DITAVAL and DITA source files to make sure there is no style conflict on the element that needs to be flagged.

message.reason: Customized stylesheet uses deprecated template "flagit". Conditional processing is no longer supported using this template.
message.response: Please update your stylesheet to use template "start-flagit" instead of deprecated template "flagit".

message.reason: The '%1' resource is not available to resolve link information.
The link or cross-reference target '%1' cannot be found, which may cause errors in the output.
No glossary entry was found associated with key '%1' on '%2' element. The build will try to determine the best display text and hover text for terms and abbreviations.
The '%1' key was used in an <abbreviated-form> element, but the key is not associated with a glossary entry.
message.response: Abbreviated-form should ONLY be used to reference to a glossary entry.

message.reason: The @id attribute value "%1" was used on a <topicref> element, but it did not reference a topic element. The @href attribute on a <topicref> element should only reference topic-level elements.
It appears that this document uses constraints, but the conref processor cannot validate that the target of a conref is valid.
message.response: To enable constraint checking, please upgrade to an XSLT 2.0 processor.

message.reason: The DITA document '%1' is linked to from the content, but not referenced by a <topicref> element in the map.
message.response: Include the topic in the map to avoid a broken link.

message.reason: The @copy-to attribute value "%1" uses the name of a resource that already exists, so this attribute is ignored.
Two unique source files each specify @copy-to="%2", which results in a collision. The value associated with @href="%1" is ignored.
Template '%1' is deprecated.
message.response: Remove references to this template from the custom XSLT or plug-ins.

message.reason: No string named '%1' was found for language '%2'.
message.response: Add a mapping for the string '%1'.

message.reason: A <topicref> element that references a map contains child <topicref> elements.
message.response: Child <topicref> elements are ignored.

message.reason: Template mode '%1' is deprecated.
message.response: Remove references to this template mode from the custom XSLT or plug-ins.

message.reason: Target '%1' is deprecated.
message.response: Remove references to this target from the custom Ant files.

message.reason: Conref range: Unable to find conref range end element with ID '%1'.
Parameter '%1' on template '%2' is deprecated.
message.response: Use parameter "%3" instead.

message.reason: Ignoring navtitle within topicgroup.
Removing broken link to '%1'.
No formatting defined for unknown @class attribute value "%1".

A content reference in a constrained document type is pulling content from an unconstrained document type. The reference will resolve, but may result in content that violates one of the document constraints in '%1'.
A content reference in a constrained document type cannot be resolved because it would violate one of the document constraints '%1'.
message.response: The current constrained document may only reuse content from documents with equivalent constraints.

message.reason: Resolving content references results in duplicate ID '%1'.
message.response: Rewriting resolved version to '%2'.
